full_text:
LAW OFFICE OF GUY FRONSTIN
515 N. FLAGLER DRIVE, SUITE 300 PAVILION
WEST PALM BEACH, FL 33401
(561) 447-4011 * (561) 802-4121 (Fax)

SENT VIA HAND DELIVERY

April 6, 2006

Lanna Belohlavek
Assistant State Attorney
Office of the State Attorney
401 N. Dixie Highway
West Palm Beach, FL 33401

Re: Jeffrey Epstein

Dear Lanna:

Thank you for giving Mr. Epstein the opportunity to present information to the Grand Jury. Enclosed please find background information on [REDACTED] and her family.

You will find the enclosed information presents Ms. [REDACTED] as someone who is untruthful, sexually active, smokes marijuana, drinks alcohol, and shoplifts regularly. Additionally, the information reveals the motive behind the false allegations.

Based on Ms. [REDACTED]'s lack of credibility, we request that you reconsider your decision to present this matter to the Grand Jury. In support of this request, it is important to acknowledge that Mr. Epstein does not use drugs or alcohol and has an unequivocal reputation for being truthful; a strict contrast to Ms. [REDACTED]'s reputation.

I look forward to hearing from you after you have had a chance to review this information.

Very truly yours,

[Signature]
Guy P. Fronstin, Esq.

GPF/mw
Enclosures (as noted)

07/26/17 Page 92 of 124 Public Records Request No.: 17-295
DOJ-OGR-00031813
